```{r}
reverser <- function(x){
Alpha <- strsplit(x, split= NULL)
Beta <- rev(Alpha[[1]])
return(paste(Beta,collapse=""))
}
reverser("1 2 3 4 5")
```

```{r}
reverser <- function(x){

Beta <- rev(x)
return(Beta)
}
reverser(1:5)
```

```{r}
scrambler <- function(x){
Alpha <- strsplit(x, split= NULL)
Beta <- sample(Alpha[[1]])
return(paste(Beta,collapse=""))
 }
scrambler("12345")
```

```{r}
scrambler <- function(x){

Beta <- sample(x)
return(Beta)
 }
scrambler(1:5)
```

```{r}
VowelBleeper <- function(input) {
supersub <- gsub("[aeiou]","*",input)
return(supersub)
}
VowelBleeper("dog")
```

```{r}
L33t<- function(input) {
sub <- chartr("e","3",input)
sub2 <- chartr("o","0",sub)
sub3 <- chartr("s","5",sub2)
sub4 <- chartr("g","9",sub3)
return(sub4)
}
L33t("go")

x <- list("go", "pose")
sapply(x,L33t)
```

```{r}
L33t<- function(input) {
x <- list(input)
sub <- chartr("e","3",input)
sub <- chartr("o","0",sub)
sub <- chartr("s","5",sub)
sub <- chartr("g","9",sub)
sapply(x, sub)
}

L33t("go","pose")

```
